subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Coach Jim Calhoun, who has led the Connecticut men’s team to three N.C.A.A. titles, broke his hip in a bicycle accident and had surgery at the UConn Health Center in Farmington.
snippet: Coach Jim Calhoun, who has led the Connecticut men’s team to three N.C.A.A. titles, broke his hip in a bicycle accident and had surgery at the UConn Health Center in Farmington.
